name: "Hollywood" Hulk Hogan
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) (Throwback Logo) Superstar Ability: You cannot pack Submission maneuvers or High Risk maneuvers. Once during each of your turns, you may overturn 3 cards and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique non-(Throwback Logo) Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: A Good Old-Fashioned Mugging
effect: (The Heat Seekers Logo) As a maneuver, can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal. As an action, this card is -50F and -50D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 2 of your cards that have been removed from the game on the bottom of your Arsenal. Unique. Stun Value: 4

name: A Technical Shoot
effect: Search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "shoot" or "technical" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your maneuvers are +1D and when you successfully play a maneuver with the word "shoot" or "technical" in the title, your opponent discards 1 card.

name: Always Have a Plan B
effect: When overturned, reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Remove this card from the game and put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. (Restricted Modification Symbol) (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Ankle Breaker
effect: This card is +#D, where # is equal to your Fortitude Rating. (Restricted Modification Symbol) (Raw Logo) Stun Value: 2

name: Argue With Tony Chimel
effect: Heel. Can only be played when your Superstar Value is greater than your opponent's Superstar Value or when you are Ken Kennedy. Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. At the end of the Pre-Match phase, put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

name: Armed & Dangerous
effect: Foreign Object. Face. When successfully played, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card. Your next card played this turn is -3F.

name: At-Ten-HUT!
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) When played from your hand, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw 1 card or put 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game on the bottom of your Arsenal. Unique.

name: Backed by Eric Bischoff
effect: Heel. Remove cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game equal to his Superstar Value plus the number of Face cards and Fan Favorite cards in his Ring area and then shuffle 1 of your cards that has been removed from the game into your Arsenal. (Raw Logo)

name: Backed by Theodore Long
effect: Shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to your Superstar Value plus the number of Cheater cards in your Ring area and then your opponent overturns 3 cards. (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Because the Fans Demanded It
effect: (The Home Team Logo) After all players' Pre-Match phases, before the first turn of the game, your opponent shuffles his hand into his Arsenal and then draws the same number of cards he shuffled in. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Unique. (Activated Card Effect Symbol)

name: Big Splash in the Corner
effect: Chain. This card can be packed by every Male Superstar, regardless of Superstar ability. Can only be played after a successfully played 3D or greater maneuver or the card titled Throw into the Corner Turnbuckle. When played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, this card is +5D and your opponent's Reversal cards to this card are +8F. (Throwback Logo)

name: Boot Camp Match
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) Once during each of your turns, when your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, you may remove 1 card in your Ringside pile from the game and then remove 1 card in his Ringside pile from the game. During your turn you may remove this card from the game and then shuffle up to 10 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your Arsenal. Permanent (Activated Card Effect Symbol) (Restricted Modification Symbol) Unique.

name: Break It Out, Break You Down, Breakin' Rules, Breakin' Ground
effect: Put 1 card with a different card title than this card from your Ring area into your Ringside pile, put 2 cards from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile, look at his hand and he discards 3 cards, and then remove 4 cards in his Ringside pile from the game. (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Chain Barrier
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, discard 1 card fewer in order to be able to reverse a Chain card from your hand or Backlash deck. Multi. Active.

name: Chain Reaction
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, your Chain maneuvers are +1D and during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of Chain cards in your Ring area. (Activated Card Effect Symbol)

name: Chained Aggression
effect: Chain. Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Chain maneuvers in your Ring area. The maximum number of cards he discards from this card is 3. When your next card played this turn is the card titled No Pain, No Chain, it cannot be reversed.

name: Entangle in the Ropes
effect: Heat. When successfully played, choose 1: your opponent puts 3 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal or he cannot play cards during his next turn. This card counts as 2 Heat cards in your Ringside pile. (Throwback Logo)

name: Everyone Wants to Watch Women Wrestle
effect: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. When your opponent is a Male Superstar, search his Arsenal for 3 non-unique Maneuver cards, remove them from the game, and he shuffles his Arsenal. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, this card is -1F, discard this card and your opponent discards 1 card. (Raw Logo)

name: Everyone Wants to Watch Women, Period
effect: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. When your opponent is a Male Superstar, he discards 3 cards. When your opponent is a Female Superstar, this card is -1F, discard this card and draw 1 card. (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Face Stretch
effect: When your Fortitude Rating is 7F or less, this card is -8F and -8D. When successfully played, you may put 1 Face card from your Ring area into your hand. (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Face the Music
effect: Face. Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of Face cards in your Ring area. The maximum number of cards he discards from this card is 6.

name: Fall-away Suplex
effect: Face. This card is -3F when your Fortitude Rating is equal to or less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for 1 non-hybrid (Throwback Logo) Maneuver card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. (Throwback Logo)

name: Feel the Fire
effect: Heat. Your opponent discards 2 cards. When this card is in your Ring area, if the card titled Sparks of Glory is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Heat cards you may play from your Ringside pile each turn is increased by 1.

name: Fisticuffs
effect: Volley: 7. When this card is reversed from your opponent's hand, remove 4 cards in his Ringside pile from the game. Stun Value: 1

name: Flurry of Finishers
effect: (The Home Team Logo) Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Unique. Multi. Stun Value: 5

name: Future Considerations
effect: Volley: 7. When this card is in your Ring area, if you successfully play a Volley maneuver, you may put 1 Volley card from your Ringside pile under this card. You may play these cards as if they were in your hand. When this card is moved from your Ring area, put the cards under this card into your Ringside pile.

name: Gimme Ten, Maggot!
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) Your opponent discards up to 10 cards and then overturns cards equal to however many fewer than 10 he discarded. Unique.

name: Grab the Mic
effect: Heel. Draw 1 card. When you are a Tag Team Superstar or you have the card titled Trash Talkin' Interview in your Ring area or Ringside pile, draw 1 additional card. Your next card played this turn cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck and his Reversal cards to your next card played this turn are +#F, where # is equal to your Superstar Value +5. (Throwback Logo)

name: Hair Pull
effect: Heel. When you are a Diva Superstar and your opponent is a Female Superstar, this card can only be reversed from his Arsenal. When successfully played, your opponent's Reversal cards to your next maneuver played this turn are +6F. (Throwback Logo)

name: Handcuffed
effect: Foreign Object. Heel. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card. When reversed from your opponent's hand, he discards 2 cards. When successfully played, draw up to 3 cards. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent discards 1 card when he plays a Face card.

name: Heat Barrier
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent needs an additional 4 Heat cards in his Ringside pile in order to play Heat cards from his Ringside pile. Multi. Active.

name: Hollywood Leg Drop
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. (Restricted Modification Symbol) (Throwback Logo) Multi. Unique. Stun Value: 3

name: Hollywood's Big Boot
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) When successfully played, you may put 1 Backlash deck card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck or you may put the card titled I Am a Real American from your Ringside pile into your Ring area. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: How Many Do You Need?
effect: When played from your hand, if your opponent has at least 5 Maneuver cards in his Ring area, reverse any Activated Card Effect or non-unique maneuver and end his turn. (Raw Logo)

name: Hulkin' Up
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text and damage until the end of the turn and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, do not discard any cards after you play the card titled No Sell Maneuver. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: I Know Cool ... And You're Not Cool
effect: (The Heat Seekers and Carlito Logos) As a reversal, when overturned, reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Spit at Opponent are Multi cards. (Cheater Logo) Multi. Unique.

name: I Live for My Hulkamaniacs...
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) Put cards from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal equal to your Superstar Value and then search your Arsenal for 1 Superstar-specific card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: I Waited Long Enough
effect: Volley: #. # is equal to your Fortitude Rating. Your opponent randomly puts cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal equal to double the number of Volley cards in your Ring area.

name: I Will Not Die
effect: (The Home Team and Matt Hardy Logos) Reverse any Submission or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You may ignore the "Can only be played after..." text on the first card played of your next turn. (Fan Favorite Logo) Unique.

name: It's Getting Hot in Here
effect: Heat. At the end of the Pre-Match phase, discard up to 4 Heat cards and your opponent discards the same number of cards -1. Active.

name: Key Lock
effect: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. This card is +3D when played by a Tag Team Superstar. (SmackDown! Logo) Multi.

name: Kokubetsu
effect: (The Heat Seekers and Tajiri Logos) Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. He discards 1 card for every Superstar-specific card in your Ring area. (Cheater Logo) Unique.

name: Let the Heeling Begin
effect: Heel. Draw cards equal to the number of Heel cards in your Ring area. The maximum number of cards you draw from this card is 6.

name: Let's Get It On!
effect: You cannot play Pre-Match cards. Your Starting Hand Size is +2. (Raw Logo) Active.

name: Managed by Lita
effect: At the end of the Pre-Match phase, you may put 1 card from your hand on the top of your Arsenal and then search your Arsenal for 1 Volley maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, if you successfully play a Volley maneuver, you may draw 1 card. Universally Unique.

name: Never Back Down - Never Quit
effect: (The Home Team and John Cena Logos) Reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, if your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, you may put this card into your hand. (Fan Favorite Logo) Unique.

name: No Pain, No Chain
effect: Chain. Draw 3 cards, shuffle 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then discard 3 cards. When your next card played this turn is the card titled Chained Aggression, it cannot be reversed.

name: On Your Home Turf
effect: (The Heat Seekers Logo) At the end of the Pre-Match phase, your opponent may put 4 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal. If he does not, he randomly removes 2 cards in his hand from the game. Universally Active. Permanent.

name: Once is Enough
effect: Face. Reverse any card if your opponent has another card with that title in his Ring area or completely reverse any Multi card and end his turn. When this card is in your Ring area, ignore the "When played from your hand," text on your cards titled Sloppy... Very Sloppy.

name: Original <WWE logo> Icon
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan and People's Team Logos) Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand or search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: Product Endorsements
effect: Face. Can only be played when your opponent does not have a Face card in his Ring area. The next Face Pre-match card you play has the added text of "The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 2." Your opponent's Superstar Value is -#, where # is equal to your Superstar Value +1 for every Face card in your Ring area. (Throwback Logo) Active.

name: Quick Poke
effect: Heat. Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When successfully played, overturn cards until you overturn a Maneuver card and that card goes into your hand instead of into your Ringside pile. Multi.

name: Ready to Fight
effect: Chain. This card is -8F when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand. (Activated Card Effect Symbol)

name: Real American Cobra Clutch
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) As a maneuver, this card is -10F and when your next card played this turn is the card titled Maintain Hold, you may ignore the "Can only be played after..." text. As a reversal, reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Unique. Stun Value: 3

name: Restart the Match
effect: After all player's Pre-Match phases, before the first turn of the game, if you reveal 1 Chain, Heat, or Volley maneuver from your hand, choose 1: all players shuffle their Ringside piles into their Arsenals or all players shuffle their hands into their Arsenals and then draw the same number of cards they had.

name: Roundhouse Kick
effect: Can only be played after a successfully played card. This card is +3D when played after a successfully played card with the (Raw Logo). (Restricted Modification Symbol) (Raw Logo)

name: Running Clothesline
effect: This card is -7F when played after the card titled Irish Whip. (SmackDown! Logo) (Throwback Logo) Stun Value: 2

name: Say Your Prayers & Eat Your Vitamins
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) Your opponent randomly discards 3 cards from his hand and 3 cards from his Backlash deck. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: Scoop Slam
effect: Chain. Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. (Throwback Logo) Multi.

name: Sgt. Slaughter
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) Legend Superstar Ability: You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 (Throwback Logo) maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Sit Right Here and Bide My Time
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, if you end your turn without playing a card, you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile under this card. During your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then put all cards under this card on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle triple that many cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. (Activated Card Effect Symbol) (SmackDown! Logo)

name: Slam
effect: Heat. When successfully played, all players put 1 card from their hand on the bottom of their Arsenal. This card counts as 2 Heat cards in your Ringside pile.

name: Slingshot Into the Ring Post
effect: As a maneuver, can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. As a reversal, reverse any card played after a Set-up card and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, if your Fortitude Rating is at least 30F greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, you win the game via Pinfall Victory. (Raw Logo)

name: Small Concealed Foreign Object
effect: Heel. When this card is in your Ring area, your Strike maneuvers are +1D and +1 Stun Value; put this card into your Ringside pile when you successfully play a non-Strike maneuver. (Throwback Logo)

name: Sparks of Glory
effect: Heat. Draw 2 cards. When this card is in your Ring area, if the card titled Feel the Fire is in your Ring area, the maximum number of Heat cards you may play from your Ringside pile each turn is increased by 1.

name: Take Your Own Medicine
effect: Foreign Object. Face. Can only be played when your opponent has an Object or a Heel card in his Ring area or when you reversed a maneuver to end his last turn and this is the first card played of your turn. Can only be reversed by non-hybrid or unique Reversal cards.

name: Technical Body Lock
effect: As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "technical" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -12F and -13D, you may put this card on top of your Arsenal and then shuffle up to 3 cards with the word "technical" in the title from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Stun Value: 1

name: Technical Drop Kick
effect: Set-up. As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "technical" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -4D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 card with the word "technical" in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand. Stun Value: 1

name: Technical Slam
effect: As a maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "technical" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. As an action, this card is -4F and -8D, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and then draw 1 card. Stun Value: 1

name: Technical Tope
effect: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver. As an action, this card is -8F and -12D, put this card on top of your Arsenal. When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "technical" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Stun Value: 1

name: The Heat Seekers
effect: (The Heat Seekers Logo) Tag Team Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 2 cards and then remove 2 cards in your Ringside pile from the game, shuffle 2 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then either draw 2 cards or search your Arsenal for 1 Heel card or 1 Cheater card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: The Home Team
effect: (The Home Team Logo) Tag Team Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns you may put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put 1 Face card or 1 Fan Favorite card from your Ringside pile into your hand. After Damage has been applied by a maneuver successfully played by your opponent, you may discard 2 cards and then shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: The Motor Pool
effect: (Sgt. Slaughter Logo) Your (Throwback Logo) maneuvers are +2D. Before Damage has been applied by a card successfully played by your opponent, remove any number of (Throwback Logo) cards in your Ringside pile from the game to reduce the Damage by 2 for each card removed in this way. (Activated Card Effect Symbol) Universally Active. Permanent.

name: The Proper Punch
effect: (The Heat Seekers and William Regal Logos) Can only be played after a successfully played card. When played after a successfully played maneuver, can only be reversed from your opponent's hand and Arsenal. (Cheater Logo) Unique. Stun Value: 1

name: The Sex, the Gods, the Freaks, the Frauds
effect: Discard 1 card; draw 2 cards; shuffle 3 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your Arsenal; and then look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 4 cards, he shuffles the chosen cards into his Arsenal, and then draws the same number of cards. (Restricted Modification Symbol) (Raw Logo)

name: The Shhhhh Chop
effect: (The Home Team and Big Show Logos) When successfully played, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and you may put 1 Mid-match card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck. (Fan Favorite Logo) Unique. Multi.

name: The Whole Dam Show
effect: (The Home Team and Rob Van Dam Logos) Remove up to 7 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game and then shuffle up to 7 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. (Fan Favorite Logo) Unique.

name: Thunder Bulldog
effect: Heal. When successfully played and damage has been applied, you may discard 1 card. If you do, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it cannot be reversed. Stun Value: 1

name: Too Hot to Handle
effect: You may discard 1 Heat card from your hand. If you do, you may play 2 additional Heat cards from your Ringside pile this turn. Your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of Heat cards in your Ring area.

name: Underestimated Prowess
effect: Volley: 7. Can only be played when you have a Volley maneuver in your Ring area. Draw 3 cards, look at your opponent's hand, and put any number of cards from his Ringside pile on the bottom of his Arsenal.

name: Unrelenting Assault
effect: Your Volley: # cards read as Volley: #+3.

name: USA! USA! USA!
effect: Face. Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating or when you have fewer cards in your hand than him. This card is a Multi when played by a Tag Team Superstar. Put 1 F: 0 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

name: Violent Vendetta
effect: ("Hollywood Hulk Hogan, Sgt. Slaughter, Home Team and Heat Seekers Logos") Foreign Object. Your opponent removes 1 card in his hand from the game. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal. Unique.

name: Volley Barrier
effect: Your opponent's Volley: # cards read as Volley: #-4. Multi. Active.

name: Volley Call
effect: Volley: 6. Shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of Volley cards in your Ringside pile.

name: We're Not Mexicans ... We're Mexicools!
effect: (The Heat Seekers and The Mexicools Logos) Your opponent removes 5 cards in his hand from the game. Put up to 4 of your cards that have been removed from the game on the bottom of your Arsenal, put up to 3 of your cards that have been removed from the game into your hand, draw up to 2 cards, discard 1 card, and then end your turn. During his next turn, you cannot play Reversal cards from your hand. (Cheater Logo) Unique.

name: Whatcha Gonna Do, Brother?
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and if your next two cards played this turn are maneuvers, they can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal. (Activated Card Effect Symbol) (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: When Hulkamania Runs Wild on You!
effect: ("Hollywood" Hulk Hogan Logo) Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and he removes all cards with that title in his hand from the game. Your next two cards played this turn cannot be reversed. (Throwback Logo) Unique.

name: You Feeling Lucky?
effect: Face. Your opponent names Strike, Grapple, or Submission. When your next card played this turn is a maneuver not of the named type, if he reverses it from his hand or Backlash deck, discard 2 cards and he discards his hand. (Throwback Logo) Multi.
